name: Beginner
description: The introductory level where you learn the basics of cyber security.

name: Novice
description: You have gained some knowledge and are ready for more challenges.

name: Intermediate
description: You have progressed beyond the basics and are becoming more aware.

name: Advanced
description: You have developed a high level of knowledge and can defend yourself from cyber attacks.

name: Expert
description: You have achieved a high level of competence and can guide people around you to become aware about cyber security.

name: Specialist
description: You have mastered the subject and are considered a true authority in the field.
